rules.name: myRule_1
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 8) AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Oppty Closed Won, Contract Start Date < TODAY

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 4 AND (2 OR 3 OR 8) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: New Opportunity is Closed Won

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: Project is Signed Off Today or Earlier

rules.name: myRule_1_pmetrule
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 8) AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Previously Met - Prev

rules.name: myRule_3_pmetrule
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 4 AND (2 OR 3 OR 8) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Previously Met - Prev

Flow.description: The process updates Account's Customer Stage based on the implementation status from Opportunity

value.stringValue: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Type, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Type, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Project_Sign_off_Date__c), NOT(ISBLANK([Opportunity].Project_Sign_off_Date__c)), [Opportunity].Project_Sign_off_Date__c <= TODAY(), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Account.Customer_Stage__c, "Onboarding"), [Opportunity].CloseDate >= DATE(2019,08,27), [Opportunity].current_user__c <> '0050P000007hH92' )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type}, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type}, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type}, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Project_Sign_off_Date__c}), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Project_Sign_off_Date__c})), {!myVariable_current.Project_Sign_off_Date__c} <= TODAY(), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Account.Customer_Stage__c}, "Onboarding"), {!myVariable_current.CloseDate} >= DATE(2019,08,27), {!myVariable_current.current_user__c} <> '0050P000007hH92' )

value.stringValue: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Type, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Type, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Project_Sign_off_Date__c), NOT(ISBLANK([Opportunity].Project_Sign_off_Date__c)), [Opportunity].Project_Sign_off_Date__c <= TODAY(), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Account.Customer_Stage__c, "Onboarding"), [Opportunity].CloseDate >= DATE(2019,08,27), [Opportunity].current_user__c <> '0050P000007hH92' )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Type}, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Type}, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Type}, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.Project_Sign_off_Date__c}), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.Project_Sign_off_Date__c})), {!myVariable_old.Project_Sign_off_Date__c} <= TODAY(), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Account.Customer_Stage__c}, "Onboarding"), {!myVariable_old.CloseDate} >= DATE(2019,08,27), {!myVariable_old.current_user__c} <> '0050P000007hH92' )

Flow.label: Set Customer Stage during Onboarding
